public_body.name: Services Australia
public_body.notes:
Do not request personal information using this site. Why?

Services Australia is an Australian Government agency which is responsible for delivering a range of welfare, social services, health services and other services for the Australian Government.

user.name: Ben Fairless
user.about_me:
I used to be one of the people who keep Right to Know working. I also used to make moderation decisions on behalf of the OpenAustralia Foundation (the charity that runs Right to Know).

All my requests are made in a personal capacity, and not on behalf of Right to Know, the OpenAustralia Foundation, or any other organisation unless specifically indicated.
